49541.summary: Some customers in the Lynnmour area of North Vancouver are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
49541.title: May 15 - North Vancouver (Lynnmour) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
